function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher secondary infection numbers in classrooms","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation, reduced class movement, monitoring of infection trends","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, occupancy sensors","People":"Students, teachers, school staff","Owner":"School administration, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Increased secondary infection numbers during colder winter months","Impact":"Greater risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Monitoring and adjustment of ventilation, implementation of additional measures, promotion of mask-wearing","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air quality monitors, mask-wearing guidance","People":"Building occupants, public in shared spaces","Owner":"Building owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Less well ventilated buildings in winter","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Maintaining open windows/vents, use of trickle vents, installation of mechanical ventilation","Technologies":"Trickle vents, mechanical ventilation systems, air quality monitors","People":"Building occupants, residents in shared living spaces","Owner":"Building owners, residents"}]}
